title: pandas: Powerful data analysis tools for Python
summary:
pandas is a Python library providing fast, expressive data structures
for working with structured or relational data sets. In addition to
being used for general purpose data manipulation and data analysis, it
has also been designed to enable Python to become a competitive
statistical computing platform. In this talk, I will discuss the
library's features and show a variety of topical examples.
quality_notes: Audio cuts out at 19:45 and doesn't come back until 23:35.
